title: #27 - That Episode Where the Vaccine Changes How People Date with Erika Ettin
description:
It’s a holiday week, so we brought back an old friend to help answer your dating and relationship questions!

Sit down, grab a drink and listen in on a chat with these friendly voices, like you’re sitting down with two old friends having a great conversation. 

Erika Ettin is an online dating expert and dating coach who helps people navigate the world of online dating. Her expertise includes profile creation, photo selection and photography, message writing, and date planning. She is also the author of the book Love at First Site: Tips & Tales for Online Dating Success from a Modern-Day Matchmaker and the co-host of the popular dating podcast “So, We Met Online…”

In this episode, we discuss…


Frustrated with online dating? Want Erika to makeover your profile or takeover your profile? Schedule a consultation to learn more. 

Find Erika’s book, Love at First Site on Amazon. (

Find Erika on Instagram 

Follow Maria on Instagram Follow Maria on TikTok Have a question for Maria? Visit http://askamatchmaker.com Enroll in Agape Match’s Group Coaching Intensive: https://agapematch.com/events To learn more about how Maria and how her team can help you find love, visit agapematch.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
